attributes.action: Stop public handouts of money for asylum support without public acceptance.
attributes.additional_details: The government could make better use to the public money by putting back into the country to support the identified unfortunate public (Pensioners, Ex-Military, Unemployed and homeless) that is currently being wasted and offered freely without the acceptance or knowledge of the UK Public.
attributes.background:
This website is absolutely unacceptable when as a country we struggle to support the local UK public (Pensioners, Ex-Military, Unemployed and homeless). 
https://www.gov.uk/asylum-support/what-youll-get

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
